subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Julia Mancuso has taken a share of first in the World Cup standings as she bids to become the first American woman to win overall since Tamara McKinney in 1983.
snippet: Julia Mancuso has taken a share of first in the World Cup standings as she bids to become the first American woman to win overall since Tamara McKinney in 1983.
